name: Winter is where?
description:
Winter is here. But where exactly? Find him! He likes to hide behind rocks and trees or even inside snowmen... You can spot him by following his footprints (which give a rough idea of the direction where he went) or by inspecting potential hideouts very closely. If you are not quick enough though, he will throw a snowball at you and blind you for a moment, and the search begins again... Have fun! (:

Created within two days for the ZenoJam. Topic: "now you see me, now you don't".

Framework used to create this piece of art: Love2d
Images: made by myself with Piskel
